result.arabic_text: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّبِعُواْ سَبِيلَنَا وَلۡنَحۡمِلۡ خَطَٰيَٰكُمۡ وَمَا هُم بِحَٰمِلِينَ مِنۡ خَطَٰيَٰهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍۖ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
result.translation: Abahakanye isengwa ry’Imana Imwe Rudende Allah mu Bakorayishi, batemera n’ivyo Yasezeraniye ibiremwa, bavuze babwira abemeye Imana Allah bakanagendera n’amabwirizwa yayo, bati: “Nimuvavanure n’idini rya Muhamadi, maze mukurikire idini ryacu, duheze twiremeke ivyaha vyanyu, tuzobihanirwe”. Eka noneho ntibashoboye kwiremeka na kimwe mu vyaha vyabo, mu vy’ukuri barabesha mu vyo babwiye abemeramana.
